CircleÔÉÅ

class pyrit.geometry.Circle(center_x: float, center_y: float, center_z: float, radius: float, angle1: float = 0, angle2: float = 6.283185307179586, angle_x: float = 0, angle_y: float = 0, angle_z: float = 0, physical_tag: Optional[int] = None)ÔÉÅ

Bases: Curve

Class representing a circle.

Create an object of the class Circle.

Parameters

  • center_x (float) ‚Äì x-coordinate of the center point.

  • center_y (float) ‚Äì y-coordinate of the center point.

  • center_z (float) ‚Äì z-coordinate of the center point.

  • radius (float) ‚Äì Radius of the circle.

  • angle1 (float, optional) ‚Äì Angle at which the circle arc begins. The default is None.

  • angle2 (float, optional) ‚Äì Angle at which the circle arc ends. The default is None.

  • angle_x (float, optional) ‚Äì Angle to rotate the circle around it‚Äôs x-axis. The default is None.

  • angle_y (float, optional) ‚Äì Angle to rotate the circle around it‚Äôs y-axis. The default is None.

  • angle_z (float, optional) ‚Äì Angle to rotate the circle around it‚Äôs z-axis. The default is None.

  • physical_tag (int, optional) ‚Äì Physical_tag of the circle. The default is None.

Return type

None.

Methods

add_to_gmsh

Add the circle in gmsh.

remove

Remove the Curve from GMSH.

reset_tag

Sets its own tag and the tags of all contained entities to None.

rotate

Rotate the Curve.

translate

Translate the Curve.

After using this property, next time getting the (existing) tag, the tag is negative.

Get the start point of the circle.

Get the tag.

remove(recursive=True)ÔÉÅ

Remove the Curve from GMSH.

Parameters

recursive (bool, optional) ‚Äì If True, all entities that define this entity are removed as well. Default is True

Return type

Sets its own tag and the tags of all contained entities to None.

property reversedÔÉÅ

After using this property, next time getting the (existing) tag, the tag is negative.

rotate(angle_x: float, angle_y: float, angle_z: float, rotation_origin: Optional[ndarray] = None)ÔÉÅ

Rotate the Curve.

Note the order of the rotation: first rotate around x-axis, then rotate around y-axis, the rotate around z-axis.

Parameters

  • angle_x (float) ‚Äì Rotation angle around x-axis in radian

  • angle_y (float) ‚Äì Rotation angle around y-axis in radian

  • angle_z (float) ‚Äì Rotation angle around z-axis in radian

  • rotation_origin (np.ndarray, optional) ‚Äì The origin around which is rotated. By default (0,0,0) is taken

Return type

None.

property tagÔÉÅ

Get the tag.

Translate the Curve.

Parameters

  • dx (float) ‚Äì Translation in x-direction

  • dy (float) ‚Äì Translation in y-direction

  • dz (float) ‚Äì Translation in z-direction

Return type

None.

Add the circle in gmsh.

Raises
